SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_product (id, time, type, name, image_url, image_resolution, image_size, image_format, image_app_url, image_app_resolution, image_app_size, image_app_format, order_time, min_amount, max_amount, min_apr, max_apr, period_unit, min_period, max_period, repayment_type, buy_type, min_invest_amount, invest_copies, bail_scale, service_fee_rule, audit_subjects, is_use) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageResolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageAppUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageAppResolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageAppSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageAppFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{minAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minApr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxApr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{periodUnit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{minPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repaymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{minInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{investCopies,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bailScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceFeeRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditSubjects,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update t_product set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_resolution = #{imageResolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_size = #{imageSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_format = #{imageFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_app_url = #{imageAppUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_app_resolution = #{imageAppResolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_app_size = #{imageAppSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_app_format = #{imageAppFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, min_amount = #{minAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, max_amount = #{maxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, min_apr = #{minApr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, max_apr = #{maxApr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, period_unit = #{periodUnit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, min_period = #{minPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_period = #{maxPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, repayment_type = #{repaymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buy_type = #{buyType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, min_invest_amount = #{minInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, invest_copies = #{investCopies,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bail_scale = #{bailScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, service_fee_rule = #{serviceFeeRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_subjects = #{auditSubjects,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, type, name, image_url, image_resolution, image_size, image_format, image_app_url, image_app_resolution, image_app_size, image_app_format, order_time, min_amount, max_amount, min_apr, max_apr, period_unit, min_period, max_period, repayment_type, buy_type, min_invest_amount, invest_copies, bail_scale, service_fee_rule, audit_subjects, is_use from t_product where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, time, type, name, image_url, image_resolution, image_size, image_format, image_app_url, image_app_resolution, image_app_size, image_app_format, order_time, min_amount, max_amount, min_apr, max_apr, period_unit, min_period, max_period, repayment_type, buy_type, min_invest_amount, invest_copies, bail_scale, service_fee_rule, audit_subjects, is_use from t_product
